description: From Latin uxōrius (“of or pertaining to a wife; overly fond of one’s wife”) + English -al (suffix forming adjectives). Uxōrius is derived from uxor (“wife”) + -ius (suffix forming adjectives).

adjectives.description: uxorial (not generally comparable, comparative more uxorial, superlative most uxorial)

entries.meaning: (not comparable) Of or pertaining to a wife, or her genes or relatives.
examples: (of or pertaining to a wife): Synonyms: wifelike, wifely, wifey
